## CanvasTransforms class

Provides a set of common 2d transforms from pixel to clip space etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CanvasTransforms implements ICanvasTransforms 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ICanvasTransforms](./core.icanvastransforms.md)
